title: Man City put eight past Salford to progress to fourth round
description: Watch highlights as Jack Grealish scores his first goal in over a year and James McAtee scores a second-half hat-trick as Manchester City surge to their biggest win since January 2019 to knock League Two Salford out of the FA Cup.
excerpt: Watch highlights as Jack Grealish scores his first goal in over a year and James McAtee scores a second-half hat-trick as Manchester City surge to their biggest win since January 2019 to knock League Two Salford out of the FA Cup.
text: Watch highlights as Jack Grealish scores his first goal in over a year and James McAtee scores a second-half hat-trick as Manchester City surge to their biggest win since January 2019 to knock League Two Salford out of the FA Cup.MATCH REPORT: Manchester City 8-0 Salford City Available to UK users only.
html:
Watch highlights as Jack Grealish scores his first goal in over a year and James McAtee scores a second-half hat-trick as Manchester City surge to their biggest win since January 2019 to knock League Two Salford out of the FA Cup.

MATCH REPORT: Manchester City 8-0 Salford City

Available to UK users only.
